title: China releases rare footage of tests inside coronavirus lab
content: Weeks after troubling images emerged showing damaged equipment at the Wuhan virology lab where the coronavirus outbreak may have originated

title: US intelligence investigating possible Wuhan lab origin of coronavirus pandemic
content: Senate Intelligence Committee member Tom Cotton says evidence points to laboratories in China as the source of the coronavirus pandemic.

title: Early COVID-19 test kits from China only 40% accurate – DOH
content: The first Coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID) test kits received from China were only 40 percent accurate, the Department of Health (DOH) said Saturday.

title: Canada rejects 1 million ‘non-compliant’ masks from China
content: Canada is rejecting 1 million face masks purchased from China for health care workers because they did not meet filtration standards, government officials said.
